author: craigmcc
msg: Update the build.xml script to support deployment to either Catalina or
Tomcat, so that both can be tested.

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove the "\r\n" that was rendered after the <textarea> tag, and before the
</textarea> tag.  This will make the rendered page harder to read if there is
data present, but does the right thing when there is no data in the value.

author: craigmcc
msg: Cast the argument passed to BeanUtils.filter to a String.
What is really wierd is that it *did* compile (JDK 1.3.0-beta for Linux) ...

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix the generated HTML for checkboxes and radio buttons to not have the
extra quote mark.  Also, correct the documentation of the radio button
tag -- the "value" attribute is required, and it is not currently possible
to use this tag to define a radio button not associated with a particular
property of the underlying form bean.
Ah, the danger of overly aggressive cut-and-paste ... :-(

author: craigmcc
msg: Actually add the property value to the HTML output if we bother to
